## clipboard.paste() function

Paste a pasteable element into the workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function paste<T extends ICopyData>(copyData: T, workspace: WorkspaceSvg, coordinate?: Coordinate): ICopyable<T> | null;
```
